meanings.definition: Relating to or derived from a single fertilized egg, as identical twins.
meanings.sent1: The monozygotic twins looked exactly alike.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that monozygotic twins come from the same egg.
meanings.sent3: The monozygotic siblings shared everything, even their taste in music.
meanings.sent4: Their bond was as strong as if they were monozygotic twins.
meanings.sent5: The concept of monozygotic twins fascinated the students in biology class.
